content: the **celtic headband** is a great project for those looking to expand their cable knitting skills on a simple and elegant accessory written and charted cable instructions are included in this free pattern the headband is knit flat width-wise with the cable pattern repeated for the desired length making the total circumference easily adjustable for any head size the celtic headband knits up quick in a bulky weight yarn and uses up less than one skein of presto by sweet paprika yarns perfect yardage for a last minute gift **size ** adult stretches to 20 easily adjustable for any head size **gauge ** 17 sts = 4 in stockinette stitch **yarn ** 1 skein of presto by sweet paprika yarns 4 06 oz/115 g 135 yds/123 m 80% merino wool 20% nylon in colorway boysenberry or any bulky weight yarn to match gauge **needles ** us size #8 5mm needles or any size necessary to obtain gauge **other materials ** cable needle darning needle please come ask questions and share either in-progress or fo photos in the juliana lustenader designs group 1 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/juliana-lustenader-designs
